publications.title: Improving the Imperceptibility of Pixel Value Difference and LSB Substitution Based Steganography Using Modulo Encoding
publications.venue: Intelligent Computing (Lecture Notes in Networks and Systems)
publications.description: Novel steganographic method combining PVD, LSB substitution, and modulo encoding with NIST SP 800-90A CTR_DRBG for improved imperceptibility.

publications.title: Monitoring Financial Stability Based on Prediction of Cryptocurrencies Price Using Intelligent Algorithm
publications.venue: 2020 International Conference on Data Science and Its Applications (ICoDSA)
publications.description: Cryptocurrency price prediction using intelligent algorithms for financial stability monitoring.

inProgress.title: SignGuard: Multi-Layer Defense System for Federated Learning
inProgress.description: Comprehensive defense system combining ECDSA authentication, multi-factor anomaly detection, time-decay reputation system, and adaptive aggregation weights.

inProgress.title: Privacy-Preserving Federated Phishing Detection
inProgress.description: Research on hybrid HE + TEE protocol for privacy-preserving phishing detection with ZK proofs for verifiable aggregation.
